alert.note: Alert for Fluvanna; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:47PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Louisa and northwestern Fluvanna Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Free Union, or near Charlottesville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palmyra, Lake Monticello, Boswells Tavern, Troy, Gordonsville, Nahor, Green Springs, Zion Crossroads, Union Mills, Wildwood, Bybee, Waldrop and Cunningham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
